channel.title: Expansive Packs on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Expansive Packs on ZooBerry

item.title: Primeval Abyssal Pack
item.description: The Primeval Abyssal Pack includes prehistoric animals, statues, and the Primeval Abyssal Aquarium.

item.title: Star Wars Expansion Pack (SWEP)
item.description: The Star Wars Expansion Pack includes a Jawa, Ewok, Wookie, Wampa Ice Creature, and a new observation area object.

item.title: SWEP2
item.description: SWEP2 adds new Star Wars-themed content, including an updated Jawa, R2D2, Sandcrawler, and various statues and buildings.

item.title: Halloween Collab Pack 2024
item.description: A small collaboration pack from a few Zoo Tycoon 1 designers which adds in various items, foliage and animals in order to make your zoo feel a bit more seasonal.

item.title: Seekings of Depth
item.description: SeeKings of Depth is a mod pack that adds a variety of prehistoric sea creatures to Zoo Tycoon 1.

item.title: Dinosaur Digs Marketing Beta Pack
item.description: A pack that converts content from the Dinosaur Digs marketing beta to the retail version of the game.

item.title: Mexico Natural Icons Pack
item.description: A pack containing five new animals, five new foliage items, and five new animated scenery items.

item.title: Unlimited Feather Overload (U.F.O.)
item.description: A new expansion pack full of prehistoric fluffy pals!!

item.title: Toadally Batrocious Land Invaders
item.description: A pack full of ancient amphibians for your zoos! This pack is a Halloween gift for all of you! Toadally Batrocious (TB) is the third of the “Works on Lacking Stuff” projects.

item.title: Mischievous Erradicators of Outside Wildlife (M.E.O.W.)
item.description: Dedicated to my two cat sisters, Vega & Rigel, whose birthday is on September 7th. Also dedicated to all cat lovers!

item.title: Bug Mayhem
item.description: A little expansion pack containing items for a full terrarium of arthropods!
